title: Birds Of Prey - The Hellpreacher (2009) [mp3@VBR]
description:
Genre(s): Thrashy Death / Sludge Metal
Origin: United States of America (Richmond, Virginia)
Full-length: Relapse Records
Release : 28 April 2009
Format: mp3@VBR (Lame 3.98r/-V0 Extreme) 

Tracklist:

1. Momma 
2. Juvie 
3. As the Field Mice Play 
4. Alive Inside! 
5. Tempt the Disciples 
6. Taking on Our Winter Blood 
7. The Excavation 
8. Blind Faith 
9. False Prophet 
10. The Owl Closes In 
11. Warriors of Mud... The Hellfighters 
12. Giving Up the Ghost 

Total playing time 40:54

Current line-up:

Ben Hogg - Vocals (Beaten Back to Pure, guest in King Travolta)
Erik Larson - Guitar (and drums on "Sulfer and Semen") (The Mighty Nimbus, Kilara, Axehandle, Avail, Parasytic, King Travolta, Alabama Thunderpussy, Hail!Hornet)
Bo Leslie - Guitar (The Last Van Zant, Throttlerod)
Summer Welch - Bass (Baroness)
Dave Witte - Drums (Municipal Waste, Burnt by the Sun, Discordance Axis, Human Remains, Redrum (US))

INFO: 

Featuring members of Baroness, Alabama Thunderpussy and legendary drummer Dave Witte of Municipal Waste and Burnt By The Sun, Birds Of Prey present their most sinister and downright musical album to date, bleeding and sweating a malevolence most death metal bands could only hope to achieve. For fans of Entombed, Grave, Disfear, Bongzilla and Amon Amarth.
